headline: Wabtec Declares Regular Quarterly Common Dividend
summary: PITTSBURGH, July 17, 2025--Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly common dividend of 25 cents per share, payable on August 28, 2025, to holders of record on August 14, 2025.

headline: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (WAB) Earnings Expected to Grow: Should You Buy?
summary: Wabtec (WAB) possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
